citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:17pm on
September 30, 2021.
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the authorized person via the phone number on file, leaving
voicemail messages and sending an email. The inspector waited 40 minutes before leaving the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:17pm on 
September 30, 2021. 
 
Upon arrival to the facility, the inspector attempted to contact the authorized person via the phone number on file, leaving 
voicemail messages and sending an email. The inspector waited 40 minutes before leaving the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
